credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Grotto in the Boboli Gardens, Florence
medium: Brush and watercolor and white gouache, pen and black ink over graphite on off-white laid paper
description: View across a meadow toward a grotto in the Boboli Gardens which features a fountain. The central portal is flanked by sculptures. At left a wall and the corridor leading to the Uffizi. Beneath it, a tree and bench with a figure. At right, a wall with a view of houses in the distance. A group of figures approaches at extreme right.
name: Drawing
